categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Veeroa Denz was a Nautolan female acolyte at the Sith Academy on Korriban during the Galactic War who escaped the world to the moon Nar Shaddaa after a Zakuulian attack. Zakuul's arrival to her new home led her to work for the Alliance against the Eternal Empire.

A Nautolan slave, Denz's Force sensitivity led her to the Sith Academy on Korriban where she faced a cruel Overseer. She escaped her training when a Zakuulan attack struck the Academy, killed her overseer and fled to Nar Shaddaa in order to start a new life while helping fugitives from the Eternal Empire.
She allied herself with The Commander in the fight against the Eternal Empire after the two destroyed the Star Fortress orbiting Nar Shadaa, lending her help until the destruction of Zakuul.

Veeroa Denz was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the digital expension Knights of the Fallen Empire, as the local contact for Nar Shaddaa in the Star Fortress series mission.
